description: A tall male figure in tattered blooded, mudded clothes of a rural farmer wearing a burlap sack over his head with two holes in it in the place of eyes, his gaping wide eyes filled with anger and malice can be seen even from long distance, whirring of his chainsaw can be evidently heard, the sound of it sends chills down your spine

A result of one of many horrible inhumane and devilish experiments conducted by 'THEM' - 23 feet tall giant buff humanoid that has basically lost all of it's intelligence and was so unsafe and violent that the cult had to isolate them and keep them locked up in some distant inaccessible areas in giant cages

Tall augmented human host of the BL9, they call it 'The Clawer' due to it being armed with razor sharp mechanical claws that it's capable of activating at will, in order to constrain indiscriminate killing power, it's eyelids were stitched together, though it's loss of sight led to increased hearing making them formidable opponents even when blind

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s swings it's claws at you!

description: Inhravtidius Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: thick armor-like carapace on it's torso, 2 spiked antennas, protruding from it's strangely shaped head, countless amount of eyes, 2 spiked tentacles, emerging from sides of this creature, 4 medium-sized crustacean legs, 2 pincers in the place of it's arms. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's pincers

description: Yengnutrium Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: 2 asymetrically growing heads - one resembles a mix of a mantis' and fly's head with multiple rapidly blinking eyes - the other resembles a mix of a locust's and cockroach's head with 2 eyes at both sides of it. What's left of it's humanoid body is barely recognizable - it's vertically elongated with 2 winged tentacles protruding from it's back. 2 serrated curved claws in the place of the arms, and 2 spiked far apart insect legs. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's claws

description: Ulniviunite Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: it's body is entirely covered with mucousy thick and durable scales, it's head is shrinked - it's mouth has turned into a lamprey-type one with forked-tongue-like 2 long spiked tentacles hanging from it, grotesquely fleshy set of spiked tentacles emerge from 3 sides of it's back, it's hands have turned into incredibly sharp and sturdy claws. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's claws

description: Ezrondium Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: it's head is elongated with countless glittering ruby red eyes, the torso - covered with great amount of red hair and filled with fleshy holes from which protrude multiple tentacles, swinging wildly in all directions, lower part - of a bloody red colored enormous arachnid. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's tentacles

description: Humanoid brute amalgamation of all feral aliens, that were brought to Earth essentially by 'Alliance' for them to experiment on. Inhravtidius carapace on it's torso along with a pincer in the place of it's left arm. Yengnutrium wings, protruding from it's back along with a razor sharp serrated claw in the place of it's right arm. Ulniviunite slime on it's torso along with a lamprey-type mouth from which a long, whip-like spiked tongue is stretching. Ezrondium arachnid legs, incredibly sharp, piercing floor as it moves. Tentacles, emerging from various parts of it's body essentially. Unlike other beasts, this one is in particular rage, as if it was made for hunting. It is bigger, faster compared to other beasts, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's tentacles

This tentacle also sports a heavy pair of pincers

description: Severely mutated astoundingly large, multi-legged beast. The crustacean-styled legs are all still connected to what seems to be a humanoid body, which hangs from his mutant form like a vestigial limb. His head is now attached to a long serpentine neck and is surrounded by hard, blade-like mandibles. A series of eyes are also dotted around the body, one on each joint of the legs and another large eye in it's mouth

It is bigger, faster compared to other beasts, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's tentacles

Unlike other beasts, this one is in particular rage, as if it was made for hunting. It is bigger, faster compared to other beasts, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier.
